thread.title: Cardinals player shatters apartment window with home run
thread.title_full: Cardinals player shatters apartment window with home run

title: Cardinals player shatters apartment window with home run
text:
Cardinals player shatters apartment window with home run Ball traveled some 460 feet Published 9:49 AM CDT Oct 12, 2015 Photos Denis Poroy/Getty Images 
St. Louis Cardinals slugger Mark Reynolds probably didn't look at his teammates in terror and yell "Run!" but it would have added a comical flair to the incident. MLB: Utley breaks Tejada's leg 
Major League Baseball will review the slide by Los Angeles Dodgers second baseman Chase Utley on Saturday night during Game 2 of the National League Division Series that resulted in New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada suffering a broken right leg.
